properties.desc: man stopped in the middle of the sidewalk to talk to people he apparently knew. his friends didn't try to move either. we ended up jaywalking because we had no choice.
man ran right by us, within a foot, on the narrowest path of the sidewalk. come the fuck on.
man skatboarding down the middle of the crosswalk. didn't try to move for anyone.
man and woman walking side by side down the middle of the sidewalk.
